name: A voidtouched ring with an emerald
data: It decreases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users wisdom a bit.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It has adequate armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance strongly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
